text.私を走らせるって…キミにも様々な\r\n覚悟が必要だったと思うけれど…\r\nそ: I know it took a lot of determination \non your part to let me run, but you \nstill made up your mind.
text.キミといるとね、\r\n体ひとつでどこまでも\r\n走って行けそうな気がするんだ: With you. I feel like I can run I feel \nlike I can run anywhere♪
text.特別な日も普通の日も…\r\n隣にはいつもキミがいる。\r\nだからぜーんぶ大事:
Whether it's a special day or an 
ordinary day… you're always by my 
side. That's why they are all 
precious memories.♪
text.ハッピーニューイヤー。\r\n本年も貴方に幸多からんことを…。\r\nなんてね？: Happy New Year. Best of luck to you \nthis year too… Just kiding, I'll be \nin your care this year too～♪
text.キミには特別にうちのシェフ特製の\r\nチョコを用意したんだ！ぜ～ったい\r\n: For you I've prepare a special choco \nmade by our chef! I really want you \nto eat something delicious!
text.あとでチョコとメッセージカードを\r\n渡すね…！なんて書いてあるかは\r\n私: I'll give you chocolate and a message \ncard later. What it says is a secret \nbetween you and me～♪
text.私も笹に吊るす飾りを作ったんだ♪\r\n日本で覚えた折り紙、\r\nお城の人たち:
I also made decorations to hang on 
bamboo branches♪ I want to show 
the people in the castle the origami 
I learned in Japan.
text.ハロウィンは古代ケルトが発祥って\r\n言われててね、実家の宝物庫にも\r\n曰:
Halloween is said to have originated 
in ancient Celtic times, I also have 
a costume in my family's treasure 
room that has a lot of history…!
text.今日は寮でクリスマスのプレゼント\r\n交換があるの！学生っぽいよね…♪\r\n:
There's a Christmas gift exchange 
in the dorms today! It's very 
student — like… ♪ Who do you think 
will get my gift?
text.もし、今晩は空いていらっしゃる？\r\nよければ街のイルミネーションを\r\n案:
Are you free this evening? If you 
don't mind, I was wondering if you 
could show me around the city 
lights?
text.大晦日はヤドリギの葉を枕の下に\r\n敷くんだ♪トレーナーにも\r\n葉っぱ、分: On New Year's Eve, I'm going to put \na mistletoe leaf under my pillow♪ \nI will share it with trainer too!
text.お誕生日おめでとう♪\r\n私からキミにささやかな祝福を…\r\nプレゼント、楽: Happy Birthday♪ A small blessing \nfrom me to you… I hope you're \nlooking forward to your gift.
text.招待状はもう見てくれたかな？\r\nキミの誕生日を祝うパーティー…\r\n今日は: Have you seen the invitations yet? \nIt's your birthday party… I will be \nyour excort today♪
text.寮に各国から誕生祝いの贈り物が\r\nたくさん届いてね…\r\n『何事だ！』って: A lot of birthday gifts arrived at the \ndormitory from all over the world… \n"What's going on!" I was surprised!
text.今日はキミとも写真を撮りたいな♪\r\n遠い地で素敵な誕生日を過ごせた\r\nこ:
I want to take a picture with you 
today♪ I want everyone in the castle 
to see that I had a wonderful 
birthday in a faraway land!
text.あら、何かお知らせがあるみたい！\r\n忘れずに伺っておきませんと。: Oh, it look liker there is an \nannouncement! I'll have to \nremember to ask.
text.贈呈品が届いてるみたいだよ♪\r\nプレゼントってワクワクだよね～！: It's like a gift has arrived♪ \nGifts are exciting isn't it!
text.ミッションを達成したんだね！\r\n褒めて遣わす～♪…なんてね！: You accomplished your mission! \nI'll give you a praise～♪ Just kidding!
text.もうすぐイベントが始まるみたい♪\r\nみんなが楽しめるよう、\r\n手配してお: Looks like the event will be starting \nsoon♪I'll have to make arrangements \nso that everyone can enjoy it.
text.イベントをやってるんだって～♪\r\nめいっぱい楽しんだあとは…労いの\r\nテ: It look like they are holding an \nevent ～♪ After enjoying it to the \nfullest… we have to have a tea party!
text.『素晴らしい笑顔と十分な睡眠が、\r\n医学書が教える最良の治療法』…\r\n体:
"A great smile and a good night's 
sleep are the best cures according to 
medical textbooks"… It's important to 
review your physical health.
text.うーん、あまり護衛の方々に\r\n心配をかけたくないから…\r\n今日はほどほど: Well, I don't want to worry the \nguards too much, so… Is it okay \nif I go in moderation today?
text.ふふふ～ん♪体が軽～い！\r\n妖精みたいに空も飛べちゃうかも♪: Fufufu～♪ My body feels so light! \nI might even be able to fly like a \nfairy♪
text.なんだかとってもいい気分～♪\r\nあっ、今朝四つ葉のクローバーを\r\n見つけ: I'm in a very good mood～♪oh, is it \nbecause I found a four-leaf clover \nthis morning?
text.準備運動にリフティングを\r\nしてきたんだ～♪というわけで、\r\nいつでも始: I've been doing lifting as a warm-up \nexercise～♪ So we can start anytime!
text.シューズのお手入れはバッチリ♪\r\nふふふっ、レプラコーンも\r\nびっくりし: The shoes are well taken care of♪ \nFufufu… even the leprechauns are \nsurprised.
text.今日もご指導よろしくね♪\r\nさて…！謹んで参りましょうか！: Thank you for your guidance today♪ \nNow…! Let's do it properly!
text.ごきげんよう。\r\n今日のトレーニングはいかように？\r\nどんな指示もこなし: Good day. How is the training today? \nI'll do whatever you tell me to do♪
text.ん～…気分転換に少しだけ四つ葉の\r\nクローバー探しをしない？: Hmmm… how about a little four-leaf \nclover hunt for a change?
text.ふぅ…しゃんとしなくちゃね…。\r\nせっかくお父さまに許可を\r\nいただいた: Ah… I have to do it properly…! \nI just got permission from my father!
text.はぁ…。っ、ごめんあそばせ。\r\n練習、始めようか？: Huu… I… I'm sorry. \nShall we start the practice?
text.正直、厳しい状況だけど…\r\n私がやると決めたことですもの。\r\nゆくべき道: To be honest, my condititon tough… \nbut it's what I decided to do. Let's \ngo the way we should go…!
text.あら、レースが続くのね。\r\nベストを尽くすのみ、だけど。: Oh, we continue the race. \nOnly the best will do, though.
text.時には自重も大事だよ？\r\n機を見誤ると勝てるものも\r\n勝てなくなっちゃう:
Self-respect is important, you know? 
If you misjudge the opportunity, you 
can't win something that you shuld 
be able to win.
text.ふっふ～ん♪今朝お城のみんなから\r\n応援メッセージをもらったの！\r\nよ～: Fufu～♪ I got a message of support \nfrom everyone at the castle this \nmorning! Alright, let's do it～!
text.気合いも調整もバッチリ！\r\nお守りにクローバーの押し花も\r\nちゃーんとポ: I'm all fired up and tuned in! \nI also carry a pressed clover flower \nin my pocket as a good luck charm.♪
text.私の実力、しっかりお見せ\r\nいたしましょう。願わくば、みなの\r\n素敵な思: Let me show you what I can do. \nHopefully, it will be a wonderful \nmemory for everyone…!
text.勝ったら記念写真を撮ろうよ！\r\n素敵な勝利と、とびっきりの笑顔を\r\n期待: If I win, let's take a commemorative \nphoto! Please look forward to a \nwonderful victory and a big smile♪
text.むっ！今日は毛艶がいいような…？\r\nほら、うちの家系特有のしっぽも\r\nい:
Mmm! Is it me, or It looks like my 
hair is shiny today…? Look, even my 
tail, which is unique to my family, 
is more glossy than usual…♪
text.さぁ、参りましょうか…！\r\n勝利を掴み、みなに\r\n栄誉をもたらしてみせま: Shall we go! I will grab victory and \nbring honor to everyone.
text.Noblesse oblige…\r\n勝つこともまた、\r\n走ると決めた私の: Noblesse oblige… winning is also my \nmission, as I have decided to run…!
text.思い出に残るレースができるよう\r\n頑張るよ！そうだっ♪祝勝会には\r\nティ: I'll do my best to make this a race \nto remember! That's right ♪ Let's \nhave a tea party at the victory party!
text.いつも通りの力が出せれば\r\n問題なく勝てるはず。\r\n行って参ります♪: If I can show our usual strength, we \nshould be able to win without any \nproblem. I'm off♪
text.ちょっと脚が重いかな…\r\n妖精にいたずらされたのかも…！\r\nむむ！彼らも: My legs are a little heavy… Maybe the \nfairies have been playing tricks on \nme…! Mmm! Let's pass them too!
text.万全とは言えないけど…\r\n故郷で応援してくれてる方々を\r\n想うと負けるわ:
I know I'm not at my best… but 
when I think of all the people back 
home who are cheering for me, 
I can't afford to lose!
text.ここから逆転してみせましょう。\r\nそんな背中に勇気づけられる方も\r\nいる:
Let's turn things around from here. 
I'm sure there are people out there 
who will be encouraged by that back 
…!
text.集中、集中…追い込まれた時こそ\r\n冷静に…幼い頃からの教えだもの。: Focus, focus… Stay calm when \nyou're cornered… that's what I've \nbeen taught since I was a little girl.
text.調子がどうあれ…王族として\r\nあまりみっともない姿は\r\n見せられないね…: Whatever your condition… I can't \nshow a disgraceful appearance as \na member of the royal family…
text.ありがとう、キミの功績を称えます♪: Thank you, I commend you for your \nachievements♪
text.ご苦労さま、お世話になりました！: Thanks for your efforts, you've been \na great help!
text.あと1歩…！ですがよい勝負でした！: Just one more step…! \nBut it was a good match!
text.善戦…かな？次こそ勝ちたいな！: A good fight… maybe? \nI want to win next time!
text.う～ん、ギリギリ入着かぁ…！: Hmmm, just barely made it in…!
text.力及ばず…苦い思い出になっちゃったね。: Unable to accomplish… it become \na bitter memory.
text.すべてはあの日に始まったんだね。\r\nふふっ、キミのエスコート、\r\nお見事: It all started that day, didn't it? \nFufu, Well done on your escort.
text.ごきげんよう！\r\n今日も思い出に残る\r\n素敵な1日にしようね♪: Have a nice day! \nLet's make today another memorable \nand wonderful day.
text.朝の身支度にメイドさんが\r\nいないのも慣れてきたなぁ…ふふ、\r\n今日も綺: I'm getting used to not having a maid \nto help me get ready in the morning… \nfufu, Isn't it beautifully done today?
text.学食の肉じゃが、美味しいよね！\r\nじゃがいもをおかずにって祖国では\r\n珍:
Meat and potatoes at the school 
cafeteria is good isn't it! Potatoes 
as a side dish is a rarity in my home 
country, I'm hooked～♪
text.昼下がりって軽い運動がしたく\r\nなるよね～…ねぇ！サッカーの\r\nパス練習:
Late afternoons make me want 
to get some light exercise………Hey! 
Will you accompany me to soccer 
passing practice?
text.今日も1日お疲れさま～♪\r\nキミは平穏無事に過ごせたかな？\r\n明日もよき: Good day again today～♪ Did you \nhave a peaceful and safe day? May \ntomorrow be a good day too…
text.寝る前にデカフェの紅茶でも\r\n飲もうかしら…一緒にいかが？\r\n紅茶占いも: Maybe I'll have a cup of decaf tea \nbefore I go to bed… would you like to \njoin me? I can tell your tea fortune♪
text.この前、シロツメクサがたくさん\r\nある公園を見つけたの。\r\n花冠で戴冠式: The other day I found a park full \nof white clover. We could play \ncoronation with flower crowns♪
text.ふぅ～、毎日あっついね～。\r\n色んな国の視察へ行ったけれど…\r\nこの湿度: It's so hot every day! I've been to \nmany countries, but this humidity is \njust feel like Japan!
text.日本は秋になるとクローバーが\r\n減ってしまうのね…？むむ…！\r\n貴重な分: Japan has fewer clovers in the fall…? \nHmmm…! The more precious it is, the \nmore happy power it seems to have.
text.寒い日はメイドさん特製の甘～い\r\nミルクティーが恋しくなっちゃう…\r\nマ: On cold days, I miss the maid's \nspecial sweet milk tea… \ndrink it in a mug full of it～♪
text.この前グルーヴさんが『ラーメン\r\nラーメンよく飽きないな』って…\r\n色ん:
The other day Groove-san said, 
"Ramen, ramen, how can you not 
get bored of it?"… There are so 
many different flavors, I never get 
tired of them!
text.シャカールをお茶会に誘う時はね、\r\n『カフェインは作業効率あがるよ』\r\n: When I invite Shakur to a tea party, \n"Caffeine improves work efficiency" \nIf I tell her that she is willing join～♪
text.フラワーちゃんのお弁当って、\r\n小さな宝石箱みたいなの。\r\nうちのシェフ: Flower's bento is like a little jewel \nbox. I wish my chef could see them♪
text.カワカミちゃんおすすめの\r\n『プリファイ』！面白いんだよ～♪\r\nうちの国:
Kawakami-chan recommended 
"Purifai"! It's very interesting～♪ 
I'd love to see it broadcast in my 
country…!
text.お父さまにお許しをいただいたから\r\nには、誇れる成績を残さないと。\r\n胸:
I must make my father proud of 
me for giving me his permission. 
I hope I can go back to my country 
with pride♪
text.動きやすいのに華やかな服…！\r\nデザイナーはどなたかしら？\r\nぜひ夜会服: Easy to move in, yet glamorous…! \nWho is the designer? I would love \nto order a ball gown…
text.みんなでお揃いの衣装を着ると\r\nキリッ…て感じだね！金ボタンも\r\n素敵だ: It's so neat when we all wear \nmatching outfits! And I love the gold \nbuttons… just like our Kingsguard♪
text.この勝負服にも大好きなクローバー\r\nモチーフをたくさんつけて\r\nもらった: I had a lot of my favorite clover \nmotifs attached to this race outfit♪ \nFufu, where is it?
text.ふふふ…制服といいこの服といい、\r\nお膝が出ると一気に身軽になるね。\r\n:
Fufufu… Uniform is good, this outfit 
is also good. Because the knees 
is out I feel lighter. It's a new 
sensation～♪
text.今朝、早朝ランニングをしたらね、\r\nクローバーに朝露がキラキラしてて\r\n:
When I ran early in the morning, 
the morning dew on the clover 
was sparkling, it reminded me 
of a castle garden♪
text.午後の練習も頑張ろうね。\r\n素敵な思い出になるかどうかは、\r\n私の実力次:
Let's do our best in the afternoon 
practice. Whether or not it will be a 
wonderful memory depends on my 
ability!
text.なるべく早寝を心がけないとね。\r\n私が夜更かしをすると護衛の方々の\r\nロ: I have to try to go to bed as early \nas possible. If I stay up too late, the \nrotation of the guards will collapse!
text.らんらら～ん♪この国の春って\r\nきらきらしてて気持ちいいな～♪\r\n1日中:
Lalala～♪ Spring in this country 
is so sparkling and pleasant～♪ 
it's like a dream to have blue skies 
all day long!
text.日本の夏の夜は一晩中暗いから\r\n綺麗な星がよく見えるよね。\r\nいい夢が見:
Japanese summer nights are dark all 
night long, so you can see beautiful 
stars very well. I think I can have a 
good dream…♪
text.日本食で特に好きなのは…松茸！\r\nいい香りですごく美味しいよね～♪\r\n学:
My favorite Japanese food is 
matsutake mushrooms! It smells 
so good and delicious～♪ I wonder 
if it won't be served at the school 
cafeteria…?
text.こたつってすごいよね～♪\r\nテーブルとベッドを合体なんて…\r\n勲章ものの: Kotatsu is amazing isn't it～♪ \nCombining a table and a bed is an \nidea worthy of a medal!
text.今日はどんなトレーニングかしら？\r\n祖国に誇れる実力をつけないとね♪: What kind of training are we doing \ntoday? I have to earn ability that \ncan make my country proud♪
text.色んな家庭教師と出会ったけど…\r\nキミの教え方は特に上手っ！: I've met a lot of tutors… but your \nteaching style is especially good!
text.全力で駆け抜けた思い出は、\r\n強さと誇りに繋がると思うんだ♪\r\nきっと将:
I think the memories of running with 
all your strength will lead to 
strength and pride. It will surely be 
my food for thought in the future…
text.さっき四つ葉のクローバーを\r\n見つけたんだ。今日の\r\nトレーニングも上手: I found a four-leaf clover earlier. \nIt feel like today's training is going \nto go well♪
text.スイカ割りって面白い遊びだね！\r\n練習の後にどう？護衛の方たちにも\r\n冷:
Watermelon splitting sounds like a 
fun game! How about we do it after 
practice? I want to treat the guard 
to something cold as well♪
text.私、どんどん強くなってる…。\r\n次はどんなワクワクを\r\n教えてくださるの: I'm getting stronger and stronger… \nI wonder what exciting things you \nwill teach me next?
text.お父さまがレースに出る許可を\r\nくださった…その信頼に応えられる\r\nよう:
Father has gave me permission to 
enter the race… Let's work hard 
together so that we can live up to 
that trust♪
text.思い出作りはね、何をしたかも大事\r\nだけど、誰といたかも大事なんだ。\r\n:
Making memories is not only about 
what you did, but also who you were 
with. I'm glad you become my trainer 
…
text.ありがとう、実に大儀でした…！: Thank you, it was really great…!
text.忘れられない素敵な思い出になったよ♪: It become a wonderful memory that \nI will never forget… ♪
text.学び、育ち、いつか使命を果たせるように…！: Learn, grow, so that one day I can \nfulfill my mission…!
text.わぁっ！\r\n最高の思い出が作れそうっ♪: Wow! \nI feel like it's going to be a great \nmemory♪
text.ごきげんよう♪ファインモーションだよ。: Good day to you♪ I'm Fine Motion.
text.素敵な思い出クローバー！\r\n私と一緒に、探してくださる？: A wonderful memory clover! \nWill you look for it with me?
text.共に称え合いましょう♪: Let us honor each other together♪
text.栄えある勝利へ、どうか導いて…！: Please guide me to a glorious \nvictory…!
text.この光は…ついて来てほしいの？\r\n待って…！…見えた！私の道が…！: This light… you want me to follow \nyou? Wait…! I see it! My path.
text.ふふっ♪みなの誇りに、なれたかしら？: Fufu♪ Did I manage to become \neveryone's pride?
text.ふふ…大盛況になりましたね。\r\nご声援、ありがとう存じます♪: Fufu… it turned out to be a great \nsuccess. Thank you for your \nsupport… ♪
text.明日はこれなんだって～。: It look like it's going to be this \none for tomorrow～
text.今日もトレーニング？\r\nご苦労さまです。: Training today? \nThank you for your hard work.
text.あら、レースへ\r\nエスコートしてくださるの？: Oh, Will you escort me to the race?
text.わぁっ、ウマ娘名鑑のレベルが\r\n上がったみたいだよ～♪: Wow, it looks like the level of the \nUma Index has gone up～♪
text.ワクワクでいっぱいな日々にしようねっ。: Let's make these days full of \nexcitement.
text.もっともっと頼っていいからね！: You can count on me more!
text.うわぁ…！\r\nクローバーの祝福かしら…！: Wow…! \nI wonder if it's blessing of the \nClover…!
text.かわいくて動きやす～い！\r\n日本のセーラー服って素敵な文化だよね♪: Cute and easy to move around in! \nJapanese sailor uniforms are a \nwonderful culture♪
text.多くの生徒が袖を通してきた、\r\n伝統ある制服…両親も感心してたよ♪: The traditional uniforms that so many \nstudents have worn… even my \nparents were impressed♪
text.おへそが出てるなんて…！\r\nメイドさんたちが見たらびっくりしそう♪: I can't believe my belly button is \nshowing…! The maids will be \nsurprised if they see it♪
text.走るとフリルが広がって…綺麗だよね♪: When I run, the frills spread out… \nit's beautiful, isn't it♪
text.胸のエンブレムが素敵でしょう？\r\n1番のお気に入りポイントなんだ♪: Isn't the emblem on the chest nice? \nIt's my favorite point♪
text.このエメラルドグリーン…祖国を思い出すなぁ。: This emerald green… it reminds me \nof my homeland.
text.私にも負けられないという覚悟があるの…\r\nいざ、走りましょう！: I have the determination not to lose… \nNow, I'll run!
text.ファインのモーニングクイズ♪\r\n今、私の左靴の中には\r\n何が入っているで: Fine's Morning Quiz♪ \nWhat's inside my left shoe right now?
text.今日はとても素敵な夢を見たんだ！\r\n結婚式で、学園のみんながリング\r\nワ: I had such a wonderful dream today! \nI dreamt that everyone at the school \nwas ring warming for my wedding.
text.1日も、もう半分経つね！\r\n時間が過ぎるのは\r\n驚くほどあっという間だよ: The day is already half over! \nIt's amazing how quickly time flies.
text.アイルランドの結婚式は長いんだ。\r\nみんなで朝まで飲んで踊って…\r\nとっ: Irish weddings are long. \nEveryone drinks and dances till the \nmorning… it looks like a lot of fun!
text.ファーストダンスの時間かな？\r\n…無上の時を分かち合いましょう。\r\n私の: Time for the first dance? \n… Let's share the best moments. \nWill you take my hand, Darling?
text.お花見へ行ってみたのだけれど、\r\n綺麗だったなぁ…！舞い踊る桜が\r\nフラ: I went to see Sakura and it was \nbeautiful…! The dancing sakura \nwere like a flower shower.
text.この間、屋台で『型抜き』をしたの\r\nだけれど、お店の方の審査がとても\r\n:
The other day, I did "die-cutting" at 
a food stall, and the store owner was 
very strict in her judging! I was so 
surprised! fufu♪
text.トンボを眺めていたらシャカールに\r\n面白いことを教えてもらったの。\r\n…:
When I was looking at dragonflies, 
Shakar told me something interesting. 
… Just a little bit take a look at 
your fingertips.
text.冬にアイルランドへ帰る時は、\r\nカイロをお土産にしようかな。\r\nメイドた:
When I go back to Ireland in the 
winter, I'll bring back a warmer as 
a souvenir. I think the maids will be 
pleased!
text.独身最後のパーティーは、特別で\r\n少しだけ寂しい夜なの。…私が開い\r\nた: A bachelorette party is a special and \nslightly lonely night. …If I throw one, \ndo you think people will come?
text.エアグルーヴさんも素敵な勝負服を\r\n持っているってお姉さまに言ったら\r\n: When I told my sister that Airgroove \n-san also had a nice match suit… it \nturned into a big deal!
text.ドーベルとまた闇鍋パーティーを\r\n開こうと思っているのだけれど、\r\nトレ: I'm thinking of throwing another dark \nhot pot party with Dober, would \ntrainers like to join us as well?
text.この前お忍びでブライトのお父上の\r\n遊園地へ行ったの。普段の遊園地は\r\n:
The other day I snuck off to Bright's 
dad's amusement park. I didn't 
know that amusement parks are 
usually so crowded!
text.この勝負服でラーメンは食べられ\r\nないかな。…あっ、フォークを\r\n使えば: I wonder if I can eat ramen in this \nrace outfit. \n… Oh, maybe if I use a fork!
text.私の輝きを表現してくださったの。\r\nとっても素敵にしていただいて…\r\n想:
She expressed my brilliance. She 
made me look so beautiful… I feel 
my spine grow taller when I feel 
your thoughts.
text.ケルティック・ノットにはね、\r\n『永遠』の意味があるんだって。\r\nビュー: The Celtic knot has the meaning of \n"eternity". You really can't beat \nBeauty-san.
text.お味噌汁は大好き！でもたまに、\r\n焦がしたイスピーニやカリカリの\r\n目玉: I love miso soup! \nBut sometimes I miss burnt ispini \nand crispy fried eggs.
text.今日のお昼はとっておきのアレを\r\n食べちゃおうかな。3分経ったら\r\nラー: I think I'll have that special thing for \nlunch today ―that magic food that \nturns into ramen after three minutes!
text.うーん、楽しい1日でした！\r\n忙しくて、賑やかで…。\r\n今夜はぐっすり眠: Well, it was a fun day! \nBusy and lively… I think I can sleep \nwell tonight.
text.クローバー畑が賑やかになって\r\nきたね！昔はお姉さまとよく、\r\n戴冠式ご: The clover field is getting lively! \nI remember when I used to play \ncoronation with my sister.
text.日本では夏が来たらあれが始まる\r\nって聞いたよ。そう、たしか…\r\n『冷や: I heard that in Japan, when summer \ncomes, that's when it starts. If i'm \nnot wrong… "Chilled Chinese noodles"!
text.本国の秋は急に冷え込むことが\r\nあるの。それで1度だけ、隊長の\r\nマフラ: It can get very cold in the fall back \nhome. So I borrowed the captain's \nscarf once, you know?
text.ねぇ、この間の雪のあと、\r\nトレーナー室の窓際に小さな\r\n雪だるまがあっ:
Hey, did you notice the little 
snowman by the window in the 
trainer's office after the snow the 
other day?
text.貴方が私を導くこと、\r\nこれを至上命令と心得なさい。\r\n…あはは！びっく: You are to lead me, and this is your \nsupreme command. \n… Ha-ha-ha! Did I surprise you?
text.2人で新しい扉を開いてみるのも\r\n楽しそうだね？: It would be fun to open a new door \ntogether, wouldn't it?
text.勝負服【ドレス】に着られる\r\nわけにはいかないもの。\r\nだから今日も、頑: Something that can't be worn as a \nrace outfit [dress]. That's why I'll \ndo my best today as well♪
text.私、キミのトレーニングノートが\r\n好きなの。私との過去と未来が\r\nたくさ: I like your training notes. \nIt has a lot of past and future \nwith me, doesn't it?
text.輝きと“理想”が込められた\r\nこの勝負服【ドレス】に、\r\n相応しい姿であ: I will continue show that I am worthy \nof this race outfit [dress] that \ncontains brilliance and "ideal".
text.いつか終わるこの道だけれど、\r\n腕を組んで、脚を揃えて…\r\n共に歩いてい: One day this road will end, but we \nwill walk it together, hand in hand, \nleg in leg… together!
text.ねぇ、トレーナー。\r\nこれからも、\r\n私を見つめてくださる？: Hey, trainer. \nFrom now on, will you continue to \nlook at me?
text.貴方との思い出、生涯忘れはしません。: I will never forget the memories with \nyou for the rest of my life.
text.リボンを結ぼう、お手をくださる？: I'll tie the ribbon. \nCan you give me your hand?
text.これからも、もうしばらく。\r\nお付き合いくださいね？: From now on, for a while longer. \nPlease stay with me, okay?
text.祝福の恩恵を賜りました！: Blessed are the blessings bestowed \nupon us!
text.ファインモーションだよ！\r\n共に未来の扉を開こう！: I'm Fine Motion! \nLet's open the door to the future \ntogether!
text.これってもしかして、\r\nファーストルック？: Could this be a first look?
text.実はね…\r\nインナーに蹄鉄の刺繍が入っているの！: Actually… \nHorseshoes are embroidered on the \ninner lining!
text.誓ってくださる？\r\n私と共に、駆け抜けてみせると！: Do you swear? \nThat you will run together with me!
text.きっと幸せな1日になるよ！: I'm sure it's going to be a happy day!
text.ふふ…♪おまたせ！\r\n思い出いっぱいのセレモニーにしよう！: Fufu… ♪ Sorry for the wait! \nLet's make this ceremony full of \nmemories!
text.セレモニーの、始まりだね！: The ceremony is about to begin!
text.なぜ、みなさんはあれほどまでに\r\nビューティーさんの勝負服を…？: Why are you all so eager to wear \nBeauty-san's race outfit…?
text.謎解き、とっても楽しかったな。\r\nいい思い出がたくさんできたね♪: Solving the riddle was a lot of fun. \nI made a lot of good memories♪
text.思い出に残る\r\n素敵な勝負をしようねっ♪: Let's have a wonderful and \nmemorable match♪
text.これぞ熱～い青春って感じだね♪\r\nまだまだ負けないよ！: This is the feeling of youth ♪ \nI still won't lose!
